column2: create table SqlErrorMessage( --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/H a row for each distinct SQL error message in the SQL Log.   ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/T See also the SqlLogAll view that denomalizes the table. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 	errorMessageID	int identity(#,#) not null primary key, --/D unique identifier 	errorMessage	varchar(#) not null,                 --/D the SQL error message     hits            int not null                            --/D how many times it occurred in the log.      ) go
